title: Seahawks rookie safety Nick Emmanwori injures ankle during Super Bowl practice

title: Court Orders UK Government To Pay £420million Compensation Over 1949 Killing Of 21 Coal Miners In Enugu
desc: A High Court of Enugu State has ordered the British government to pay £420million as compensation to the families of 21 Nigerian coal miners who were killed by British colonial officers at the Iva Valley Coal Mine, Enugu, in 1949.

title: Journal silently removes paper for plagiarism, author claims identity theft
desc: If a plagiarized paper by an author who claims he didn’t write it disappears from a journal’s website with no notice, did it ever exist in the first place? title: JD Vance’s first Olympic appearance unfolds with more photo-ops than protests
desc: Amid officials’ concern about vocal crowd reactions against the US, the vice-president’s visit to a hockey game felt closer to theater than geopolitics
